New Records: Taijuan Walker allowed a franchise record 13 hits in a single game, the most by a Phillies pitcher since 1948
Key Match Events: The Phillies suffered a 10-0 loss to the Astros, with Taijuan Walker struggling on the mound
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson expressed concern for Taijuan Walker's performance and future with the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies may consider moving Taijuan Walker to the bullpen or exploring other roster options as they approach the playoffs
